title: Project-Based Educational Program for Negotiation Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in scientific fields and understanding of basic negotiation theory
context.additional_context: A process where practitioners apply real-world scientific negotiation cases to projects, enhancing negotiation skills and self-efficacy.

learning_goals: Learners can apply integrated conflict management strategies in negotiation processes with over 80% accuracy through project-based activities.
Learners can apply acquired negotiation skills in real work environments at least twice within one month after training completion.
Learners confirm a 20% or greater increase in self-efficacy scores through pre- and post-assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
